anya-e0906n:9_1: paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle āvuso dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṃgītikārā paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0906n:9_2: vinayapiṭakaṃ saṃgāyitvā suttantapiṭake ca dīghamajjhimasaṃyuttaaṅguttarasaṃkhāte cattāro mahānikāye
anya-e0906n:9_3: saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ kiṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0906n:10_1: paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle bhante dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṃgītikārā paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0906n:10_2: vinayapiṭakaṃ saṃgāyitvā suttantapiṭake ca dīghamajjhimasaṃyuttaaṅguttarasaṃkhāte cattāro nikāye saṃgāyitvā
anya-e0906n:11_1: imissampi āvuso chaṭṭhasaṃgītiyaṃ sakalañceva vinayapiṭakaṃ saṃgītaṃ,
anya-e0906n:11_3: Kālo dāni āvuso sampatto abhidhammapiṭakaṃ saṃgāyituṃ,
anya-e0906n:11_5: Abhidhammo nāmesa āvuso kenaṭṭhena abhidhammoti vuccati.
anya-e0906n:12_0: Vissajjanā – dhammātireka dhammavisesaṭṭhena bhante abhidhammoti vuccati.
anya-e0906n:13_0: Pucchā – so panesa āvuso abhidhammo kena kattha kadā ca adhigato.
anya-e0906n:14_1: so kho bhante abhidhammo sabbaññubuddhena mahābodhimaṇḍamūle vesākhapuṇṇamiyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ adhigato.
anya-e0906n:15_0: Pucchā – kattha panesa āvuso abhidhammo bhagavatā kadā ca vicito.
anya-e0906n:16_0: Vissajjanā – so kho bhante abhidhammo bhagavatā mahābodhimaṇḍe ratanagharasattāhe vicito.
anya-e0906n:17_0: Pucchā – kattha panesa āvuso abhidhammo bhagavatā kadā kassatthāya ca desito.
anya-e0906n:18_1: so kho bhante abhidhammo bhagavatā devesu tāvatiṃsesu pāricchattakamūlamhi paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ abhisambodhito
anya-e0906n:18_2: sattame vasse mātaraṃ pamukhaṃ katvā dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi āgamma sannisinnānaṃ devatānaṃ caturoghanittharaṇatthāya
anya-e0906n:19_0: Pucchā – kenesa āvuso abhidhammo paṭhamaṃ manussaloke patiggahito, kassa ca puna tena desito.
anya-e0906n:20_1: āyasmatā bhante sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā esa abhidhammo paṭhamaṃ manussaloke patiggahito,
anya-e0906n:20_2: teneva bhante āyasmatā sāriputtattherena attano saddhivihārikānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ desito.
anya-e0906n:22_0: Vissajjanā – sekhā ca bhante puthujjanā kalyāṇakā ca sikkhanti.
anya-e0906n:26_0: Vissajjanā – yesaṃ bhante vattati, te dhārenti.
anya-e0906n:28_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0906n:32_2: Tesu paṭhamaṃ bhagavatā kataraṃ pakaraṇaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:33_0: Vissajjanā – paṭhamaṃ bhante dhammasaṅgaṇipakaraṇaṃ bhagavatā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:34_3: Tesu mātikaṃ nikkhipantena bhagavatā kataṃ nikkhittā.
anya-e0906n:35_1: mātikaṃ bhante nikkhipantena bhagavatā “kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā abyākatā dhammā.
anya-e0906n:35_2: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā.
anya-e0906n:35_3: Vipākā dhammā vipākadhammadhammā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā”ti evamādinā dvāvīsatiyā tikānaṃ vasena.
anya-e0906n:36_1: Hetū ceva dhammā sahetukā ca sahetukā ceva dhammā na ca hetū.
anya-e0906n:36_2: Hetū ceva dhammā hetusampayuttā ca hetusampayuttā ceva dhammā na ca hetū.
anya-e0906n:36_3: Na hetū kho pana dhammā sahetukāpi ahetukāpī”ti evamādinā dukasatānañca vasena mātikā nikkhittā.
anya-e0906n:38_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ padabhājanīye cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā dhammātipadassa atthaṃ vibhajantena
anya-e0906n:38_2: bhagavatā kathaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:39_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante dhammasaṅgaṇipakaraṇe cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā dhammāti padassa atthaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā “katame dhammā kusalā.
anya-e0906n:39_2: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0906n:39_3: vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ
anya-e0906n:39_5: Tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti vedanā hoti saññā hoti cetanā hoti cittaṃ hoti vitakko hoti vicāro hoti pīti
anya-e0906n:39_6: hoti sukhaṃ hoti cittassekaggatā hotī”ti evamādinā kāmāvacarakusalaṃ tīhi mahāvārehi vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:41_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷiyaṃ cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā dhammāti padassa atthaṃ vibhajantena
anya-e0906n:41_2: bhagavatā kathaṃ rūpāvacarakusalañca arūpāvacarakusalañca vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:42_2: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savitakkaṃ
anya-e0906n:42_3: vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇa”nti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:44_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷiyaṃ cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā dhammāti padassa atthaṃ vibhajantena
anya-e0906n:44_2: bhagavatā kathaṃ lokuttarakusalaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:45_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā dhammāti padassa atthaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā “katame dhammā kusalā.
anya-e0906n:45_2: Yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi…pe…
anya-e0906n:45_3: paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiñña”nti evamādinā bhagavatā lokuttarakusalaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:47_1: tattheva āvuso akusalā dhammāti mātikāpadassa atthaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā kathaṃ akusalaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:48_1: tattheva bhante akusalā dhammāti mātikāpadassa atthaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā “katame dhammā akusalā.
anya-e0906n:48_2: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā
anya-e0906n:48_3: saddhārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā
anya-e0906n:48_5: Tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti vedanā hoti saññā hoti cetanā hoti cittaṃ hotī”ti evamādinā akusalaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:50_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷiyaṃ cittuppādakaṇḍarūpakaṇḍesu abyākatā dhammāti mātikāpadassa
anya-e0906n:50_2: atthaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā kathaṃ abyākatā dhammā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:51_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ abyākatā dhammāti padassa atthaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā “katame dhammā abyākatā.
anya-e0906n:51_2: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0906n:51_3: Tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti vedanā hoti saññā hoti cetanā hoti cittaṃ hotī”ti evamādinā ca cittuppādakaṇḍe,
anya-e0906n:51_5: Kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākā kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā arūpāvacarā apariyāpannā vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho.
anya-e0906n:51_6: Ye ca dhammā kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā.
anya-e0906n:51_8: Ime dhammā abyākatā”ti evamādinā ca abyākatā dhammā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:53_0: Pucchā – sattasu āvuso abhidhammappakaraṇesu vibhaṅgappakaraṇe bhagavatā kati vibhaṅgā desitā.
anya-e0906n:54_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu dutiye vibhaṅgappakaraṇe khandhavibhaṅgo āyatanavibhaṅgo dhātuvibhaṅgo
anya-e0906n:54_2: saccavibhaṅgo indriyavibhaṅgo paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅgo satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgo sammappadhānavibhaṅgo iddhipādavibhaṅgo
anya-e0906n:54_3: bojjhaṅgavibhaṅgo maggaṅgavibhaṅgo jhānavibhaṅgo appamaññāvibhaṅgo sikkhāpadavibhaṅgo paṭisambhidāvibhaṅgo
anya-e0906n:54_4: ñāṇavibhaṅgo khuddakavatthuvibhaṅgo dhammahadayavibhaṅgoti bhagavatā aṭṭhārasa vibhaṅgā desitā.
anya-e0906n:56_1: tesu āvuso aṭṭhārasasu vibhaṅgesu paṭhame khandhavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ khandhā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:57_1: tesu bhante aṭṭhārasasu vibhaṅgesu paṭhame khandhavibhaṅge “pañcakkhandhā rūpakkhandho vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho.
anya-e0906n:57_3: yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā,
anya-e0906n:57_4: tadekajjhaṃ abhisaññūhitvā abhisaṅkhipitvā ayaṃ vuccati rūpakkhandho”ti evamādinā suttantabhājanīyaabhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0906n:57_5: tīhi mahānayehi bhagavatā khandhā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:59_1: dutiye pana āvuso āyatanavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ āyatanāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:60_1: dutiye bhante āyatanavibhaṅge “dvādasāyatanāni cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ sotāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ ghānāyatanaṃ
anya-e0906n:60_2: gandhāyatanaṃ jivhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ kāyāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ manāyatanaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ.
anya-e0906n:60_4: rūpā aniccā dukkhā anattā vipariṇāmadhammā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā suttantabhājanīyaabhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0906n:62_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe tatiye dhātuvibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ dhātuyo vitthārena vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:63_1: tatiye bhante dhātuvibhaṅge “cha dhātuyo pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātu ākāsadhātu viññāṇadhātū”ti
anya-e0906n:65_0: Pucchā – catutthe pana āvuso saccavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ saccāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:66_1: catutthe bhante saccavibhaṅge “cattāri ariyasaccāni dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ,
anya-e0906n:66_15: tīhi mahānayehi bhagavatā saccāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:68_1: pañcame pana āvuso indriyavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ indriyāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:69_1: pañcame pana bhante indriyavibhaṅge “bāvīsatindriyāni cakkhundriyaṃ sotindriyaṃ ghānindriyaṃ jivhindriyaṃ kāyindriyaṃ manindriyaṃ…pe…
anya-e0906n:69_2: aññātāvindriya”nti evamādinā abhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakasaṅkhātehi dvīhi mahānayehi bhagavatā indriyāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:71_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe chaṭṭhe paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ paṭiccasamuppādo vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:72_2: samudayo hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā paṭiccasamuppādo suttantabhājanīyaabhidhammabhājanīyasaṅkhātehi dvīhi mahānayehi vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:74_1: sattame pana āvuso satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ satipaṭṭhānā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:75_1: sattame bhante satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅge “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā idha bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ kāye kāyānupassī viharati,
anya-e0906n:75_3: ajjhattabahiddhā kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassa”nti
anya-e0906n:77_1: aṭṭhame pana āvuso sammappadhānavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ sammappadhānā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:78_1: aṭṭhame bhante sammappadhānavibhaṅge “cattāro sammappadhānā idha bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ
anya-e0906n:78_2: dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati,
anya-e0906n:78_3: uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati,
anya-e0906n:78_4: anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati,
anya-e0906n:78_5: uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ
anya-e0906n:78_6: janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā sammappadhānā vitthārato
anya-e0906n:80_1: navame pana āvuso iddhipādavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ iddhipādā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:81_1: navame bhante iddhipādavibhaṅge “cattāro iddhipādā idha bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti…pe…
anya-e0906n:81_2: vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāvetī”ti evamādinā tīhi mahānayehi bhagavatā iddhipādā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:83_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe dasame bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ bojjhaṅgā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:84_1: dasame bhante bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge “satta bojjhaṅgā satisambojjhaṅgo dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo
anya-e0906n:84_4: idha bhikkhu satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā hoti anussaritā,
anya-e0906n:84_6: tīhi nayehi bojjhaṅgā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:86_1: ekādasame pana āvuso maggaṅgavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ maggaṅgā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:87_3: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhī”ti evamādinā
anya-e0906n:89_0: Pucchā – dvādasamo pana āvuso jhānavibhaṅgo bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:90_1: dvādasamo bhante jhānavibhaṅgo “idha bhikkhu pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu
anya-e0906n:90_2: vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū pubbarattāpararattaṃ
anya-e0906n:90_3: jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:92_1: terasame pana āvuso appamaññāvibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ appamaññāyo vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:93_1: terasame bhante appamaññāvibhaṅge “catasso appamaññāyo idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati,
anya-e0906n:93_5: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
anya-e0906n:93_6: appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā suttantabhājanīyaabhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0906n:93_7: tīhi mahānayehi appamaññāyo vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:95_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe cuddasame sikkhāpadavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ sikkhāpadāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:96_1: cuddasame bhante sikkhāpadavibhaṅge “pañca sikkhāpadāni pāṇātipātā veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṃ,
anya-e0906n:96_7: yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ pāṇātipātā
anya-e0906n:96_8: viramantassā”ti evamādinā abhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakasaṅkhātehi dvīhi mahānayehi bhagavatā sikkhāpadāni
anya-e0906n:98_1: pannarasame pana āvuso paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ paṭisambhidāyo vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:99_1: pannarasame bhante paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge “catasso paṭisambhidā atthapaṭisambhidā dhammapaṭisambhidā niruttipaṭisambhidā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā.
anya-e0906n:99_5: ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā catasso paṭisambhidāyo suttantabhājanīyaabhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0906n:101_0: Pucchā – soḷasame pana āvuso ñāṇavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ ñāṇāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:102_1: soḷasame bhante ñāṇavibhaṅge “ekavidhena ñāṇavatthu pañcaviññāṇā na hetū, ahetukā,
anya-e0906n:102_4: sāsavā”ti evamādinā ekakato paṭṭhāya yāva dasakā bhagavatā ñāṇāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:104_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe sattarasamo khuddakavatthuvibhaṅgo bhagavatā kathaṃ desito.
anya-e0906n:105_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante dutiye vibhaṅgappakaraṇe sattarasamo khuddakavatthuvibhaṅgo “jātimado,
anya-e0906n:105_5: jīvitamado”ti evamādinā ekakato paṭṭhāya yāva aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritaṃ bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:107_0: Pucchā – tattha āvuso aṭṭhārasamo dhammahadayavibhaṅgo bhagavatā kathaṃ vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:108_24: satta cittānī”ti evamādinā sabbasaṅgāhakādīhi dasahi vārehi bhagavatā vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:109_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā uppādakakammaāyuppamāṇavāro vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:110_1: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā kattha upapajjanti.
anya-e0906n:110_3: sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā appekacce khattiyamahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti,
anya-e0906n:110_9: appekacce tusitānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjantīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā uppādakakammaāyuppamāṇavāro vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:114_1: tenāvuso bhagavatā aṭṭhārasahi buddhadhammehi samannāgatena abhidhamme aṭṭhārasahi vibhaṅgehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ
anya-e0906n:114_2: dutiyaṃ vibhaṅgappakaraṇaṃ desetvā tadanantaraṃ dhātukathaṃ nāma tatiyaṃ pakaraṇaṃ kathaṃ vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:115_1: tatiyaṃ bhante dhātukathaṃ nāma abhidhammapiṭakaṃ “saṅgaho asaṅgaho,
anya-e0906n:115_14: vippayuttena saṅgahitaṃ asaṅgahita”nti evamādinā pañca mātikāyo paṭhamaṃ nikkhipitvā saṅgahāsaṅgahādīhi
anya-e0906n:115_15: cuddasahi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:117_1: tenāvuso bhagavatā sabbadhātukusalena abhidhammapiṭake tatiyaṃ dhātukathāpakaraṇaṃ desetvā tadanantaraṃ
anya-e0906n:118_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante catutthaṃ puggalapaññattippakaraṇaṃ “cha paññattiyo khandhapaññatti āyatanapaññatti
anya-e0906n:118_6: Ettāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhapaññattī”ti evamādinā khandhāyatanadhātusaccaindriyapaññattiyo saṃkhittena
anya-e0906n:120_1: tenāvuso bhagavatā sabbaparamatthapaññattidhammakusalena abhidhammapiṭake catutthaṃ puggalapaññattippakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0906n:120_2: desetvā tadanantaraṃ pañcamaṃ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ kathaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:121_1: sabbaparamatthapaññattidhammakusalena bhante bhagavatā loke aggapuggalena abhidhammapiṭake catutthaṃ
anya-e0906n:121_2: puggalapaññattippakaraṇaṃ desetvā tadanantaraṃ kathāvatthudesanāya vāre sampatte “anāgate mama sāvako
anya-e0906n:121_3: moggaliputtatissatthero nāma uppannaṃ sāsanamalaṃ sodhetvā tatiyasaṅgītiṃ karonto bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe
anya-e0906n:121_4: nisinno sakavāde pañca suttasatāni paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṃ samodhānetvā,
anya-e0906n:121_5: imaṃ pakaraṇaṃ bhājessatī”ti tassokāsaṃ karontena puggalavāre aṭṭhamukhā vādayuttiṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbakathāmaggesu
anya-e0906n:121_6: asampuṇṇabhāṇavāratthāya tantiyā mātikā nikkhepamattena pañcamaṃ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ saṃkhepato desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:122_1: adhunā pākaṭaṃ panāvuso vitthāraṃ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ kadā kena kattha kathañca vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:123_1: taṃ kho bhante bhagavato nayamukhaṃ nissāya āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena tatiyasaṃgītikāle
anya-e0906n:123_2: pāṭaliputte asokārāme saṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassānaṃ samāgame bhagavatā dinnanayavasena tathāgatena ṭhapitamātikaṃ
anya-e0906n:123_3: vibhajantena sakavāde pañcasuttasatāni paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṃ āharitvā idaṃ paravādamathanaṃ
anya-e0906n:123_4: adhunā pākaṭaṃ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:124_1: kati āvuso tattha kathāyo tena āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:125_1: tattha bhante vācanāmaggato dve ca satāni sattavīsati ca kathāyo āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:127_1: kathañcāvuso tattha paṭhamā puggalakathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:128_5: Ājānāhi niggahaṃ hañci puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena,
anya-e0906n:128_6: tena vata re vattabbe “yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho,
anya-e0906n:128_8: Yaṃ tattha vadesi “vattabbe kho ‘puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’,
anya-e0906n:128_11: micchāti evamādinā bhante tattha paṭhamā puggalakathā pañca bhāṇavāramattāya tantiyā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena
anya-e0906n:130_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso kathāvatthuppakaraṇe dutiyavagge dutiyā aññāṇakathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena
anya-e0906n:131_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe dutiyavagge dutiyā aññāṇakathā “atthi arahato aññāṇanti, āmantā.
anya-e0906n:131_2: Atthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇanti,
anya-e0906n:131_4: Natthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānivaraṇanti, āmantā.
anya-e0906n:131_5: Hañci natthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0906n:131_6: no ca vata re vattabbe “atthi arahato aññāṇa”nti evamādinā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā bhāsitā.
anya-e0906n:133_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe tatiyavagge ekādasamā asaññakathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena
anya-e0906n:134_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe tatiyavagge ekādasamā asaññakathā “asaññasattesu saññā atthīti, āmantā.
anya-e0906n:134_2: Saññābhavo saññāgati saññāsattāvāso saññāsaṃsāro saññāyoni saññattabhāvapaṭilābhoti,
anya-e0906n:134_3: na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti evamādinā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:136_0: Saññābhavo saññāgati saññāsattāvāso saññāsaṃsāro saññāyoni saññattabhāvapaṭilābho.
anya-e0906n:138_0: Nanu asaññabhavo asaññagati asaññasattāvāso asaññasaṃsāro asaññayoni asaññattabhāvapaṭilābho.
anya-e0906n:139_0: Hañci asaññabhavo asaññagati asaññasattāvāso asaññasaṃsāro asaññayoni asaññattabhāvapaṭilābho,
anya-e0906n:139_1: no ca vata re vattabbe asaññasattesu saññā atthi.
anya-e0906n:141_0: Pañcavokārabhavo gati sattāvāso saṃsāro yoni attabhāvapaṭilābho.
anya-e0906n:142_0: Nanu ekavokārabhavo gati sattāvāso saṃsāro yoni attabhāvapaṭilābho.
anya-e0906n:143_0: Hañci ekavokārabhavo gati sattāvāso saṃsāro yoni attabhāvapaṭilābho,
anya-e0906n:143_1: no ca vata re vattabbe asaññasattesu saññā atthi.
anya-e0906n:146_1: chaṭṭhavagge pana āvuso aṭṭhamā pathavīdhātu sanidassanātiādikathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:147_1: chaṭṭhavagge bhante aṭṭhamā pathavīdhātu sanidassanātiādikathā “pathavīdhātu sanidassanāti āmantā.
anya-e0906n:147_2: Rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ rūpadhātu nīlaṃ pītakaṃ lohitakaṃ odātaṃ cakkhuviññeyyaṃ cakkhusmiṃ paṭihaññati cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchatīti,
anya-e0906n:147_3: na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti evamādinā āyasmatā mahāmoggali puttatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:150_0: Tena hi na vattabbaṃ cakkhuñca paṭicca pathavīdhātuñca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0906n:152_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe aṭṭhamavagge dutiyā antarābhavakathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena
anya-e0906n:153_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe aṭṭhamavagge dutiyā antarābhavakathā “atthi antarābhavoti, āmantā.
anya-e0906n:153_9: na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti evamādinā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:157_0: Kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare atthi antarābhavo.
anya-e0906n:159_0: Rūpabhavassa ca arūpabhavassa ca antare atthi antarābhavo.
anya-e0906n:160_0: Kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavo.
anya-e0906n:161_0: Hañci kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavo,
anya-e0906n:161_1: no ca vata re vattabbe atthi antarābhavo.
anya-e0906n:163_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe cuddasamavagge dutiyā saḷāyatanuppattikathā āyasmatā
anya-e0906n:164_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe cuddasamevagge dutiyā saḷāyatanuppattikathā “saḷāyatanaṃ
anya-e0906n:164_4: na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti evamādinā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:171_1: tenāvuso bhagavatā yamakapāṭihīrāvasāne tāvatiṃsadevalokaṃ gantvā dasasahassalokadhātūhi āgamma sannisinnānaṃ
anya-e0906n:171_2: devānaṃ abhidhammadesanaṃ desentena paṭhamaṃ abhidhammapiṭake pañcappakaraṇāni desetvā tadanantaraṃ chaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0906n:171_3: yamakappakaraṇaṃ desentena kati yamakappakaraṇāni vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:172_1: bhagavatā bhante yamassa visayātītena yamakapāṭihīrāvasāne tāvatiṃsadevalokaṃ gantvā tattha dasasahassalokadhātūhi
anya-e0906n:172_2: āgamma sannisinnānaṃ devatānaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desentena abhidhammapiṭake pūrimāni pañcappakaraṇāni
anya-e0906n:172_3: desetvā tadanantaraṃ chaṭṭhaṃ yamakappakaraṇaṃ mūlayamakaṃ khandhayamakaṃ āyatanayamakaṃ dhātuyamakaṃ
anya-e0906n:172_4: saccayamakaṃ saṅkhārayamakaṃ anusayayamakaṃ cittayamakaṃ dhammayamakaṃ indriyayamakanti dasa yamakappakaraṇāni
anya-e0906n:174_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ mūlayamakaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:175_12: sabbe te dhammā kusalāti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ mūlayamakaṃ bāvīsatiyā ca tikehi dukasatena ca vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:176_0: Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlā.
anya-e0906n:179_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dutiyaṃ khandhayamakaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:180_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dutiyaṃ khandhayamakaṃ “pañcakkhandhā –
anya-e0906n:180_12: viññāṇakkhandho viññāṇa”nti evamādinā bhagavatā paṇṇattivārapavattivārapariññāvārasaṅkhātehi tīhi vārehi vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:182_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe tatiyaṃ āyatanayamakaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:183_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe tatiyaṃ āyatanayamakaṃ “dvādasāyatanāni –
anya-e0906n:183_2: cakkhāyatanaṃ sotāyatanaṃ ghānāyatanaṃ jivhāyatanaṃ kāyāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ
anya-e0906n:183_7: sotāyatanaṃ sota”nti evamādinā paṇṇattivārapavattivārapariññāvārasaṅkhātehi tīhi vārehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:185_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu catutthaṃ dhātuyamakaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:186_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu catutthaṃ dhātuyamakaṃ “aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo –
anya-e0906n:186_2: cakkhudhātu sotadhātu ghānadhātu jivhādhātu kāyadhātu rūpadhātu saddadhātu gandhadhātu rasadhātu phoṭṭhabbadhātu
anya-e0906n:186_3: cakkhuviññāṇadhātu sotaviññāṇadhātu ghānaviññāṇadhātu jivhāviññāṇadhātu kāyaviññāṇadhātu manodhātu manoviññāṇadhātu
anya-e0906n:186_4: dhammadhātū”ti evamādinā bhagavatā paṇṇattivārapavattivārapariññāvārasaṅkhātehi tīhi mahāvārehi vitthārato
anya-e0906n:188_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu pañcamaṃ saccayamakaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:189_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu pañcamaṃ saccayamakaṃ “cattāri saccāni –
anya-e0906n:189_10: maggasaccaṃ maggo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:191_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu chaṭṭhaṃ saṅkhārayamakaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:192_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu chaṭṭhaṃ saṅkhārayamakaṃ “tayo saṅkhārā –
anya-e0906n:192_6: saññā ca vedanā ca cittasaṅkhāro ṭhapetvā vitakkavicāre sabbepi cittasampayuttakā dhammā cittasaṅkhāro”ti
anya-e0906n:192_7: evamādinā bhagavatā paṇṇattivārapavattivārapariññāvārasaṅkhātehi tīhi mahāvārehi vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:194_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu sattamaṃ anusayayamakaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:195_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu sattamaṃ anusayayamakaṃ “satta anusayā –
anya-e0906n:195_2: kāmarāgānusayo paṭighānusayo mānānusayo diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchānusayo bhavarāgānusayo avijjānusayo.
anya-e0906n:195_4: kāmadhātuyā dvīsu vedanāsu ettha kāmarāgānusayo anusetī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā uppattiṭṭhānavāra anusayavāra
anya-e0906n:195_5: sānusayavāra pajahanavāra pariññāvāra pahīnavāra uppajjanavāra dhātuvārasaṅkhātehi aṭṭhahi mahāvārehi
anya-e0906n:197_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu aṭṭhamaṃ cittayamakaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:198_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu aṭṭhamaṃ cittayamakaṃ “yassa cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati,
anya-e0906n:198_3: Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissati,
anya-e0906n:198_4: tassa cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā suddhacittasāmaññasuttantacittamissakavisesaabhidhammacittamissakavisesa-
anya-e0906n:198_5: saṅkhātehi tīhi mahānayeti vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:200_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu navamaṃ dhammayamakaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:201_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu navamaṃ dhammayamakaṃ “kusalā kusalā dhammā,
anya-e0906n:201_6: abyākatā dhammā abyākatā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā paṇṇattivārapavattivārapariññāvārasaṅkhātehi tīhi mahāvārehi vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:203_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu dasamaṃ indriyayamakaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:204_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu dasamaṃ indriyayamakaṃ “bāvīsatindriyāni –
anya-e0906n:204_2: cakkhundriyaṃ sotindriyaṃ ghānindriyaṃ jivhindriyaṃ kāyindriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ
anya-e0906n:204_3: manindriyaṃ sukhindriyaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ domanassindriyaṃ upekkhindriyaṃ saddhindriyaṃ
anya-e0906n:204_4: vīriyindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ aññindriyaṃ aññātāvindriya”nti evamādinā
anya-e0906n:204_5: bhagavatā paṇṇattivāra pavattivāra pariññāvārasaṅkhātehi tīhi mahāvārehi vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:206_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso indriyayamake tīsu mahāvāresu pavattivāre uppādaatītavāro bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:207_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante indriyayamake tīsu mahāvāresu pavattivāre uppādaatītavāro “yassa cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjitta,
anya-e0906n:209_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso indriyayamake tīsu mahāvāresu pavattivāre uppādaanāgatavāro bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:210_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante indriyayamake tīsu mahāvāresu pavattivāre uppādaanāgatavāro “yassa cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjissati,
anya-e0906n:210_12: itaresaṃ tesaṃ cakkhundriyañca uppajjissati kāyindriyañca uppajjissatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:211_3: ye ca purisā eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjissati,
anya-e0906n:211_5: itaresaṃ tesaṃ cakkhundriyañca uppajjissati itthindriyañca uppajjissati.
anya-e0906n:212_3: yā ca itthiyo eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti,
anya-e0906n:212_6: Itaresaṃ tesaṃ cakkhundriyañca uppajjissati purisindriyañca uppajjissati.
anya-e0906n:213_2: yā itthiyo eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti,
anya-e0906n:213_5: Itaresaṃ tesaṃ itthindriyañca uppajjissati purisindriyañca uppajjissati.
anya-e0906n:215_1: tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena abhisambuddhakālato sattamavasse manussaloke
anya-e0906n:215_2: yamakapāṭihīraṃ dassetvā tadanantaraṃ tāvatiṃsadevalokaṃ gantvā tattha paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ sannisīditvā
anya-e0906n:215_3: dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi āgamma sannisinnānaṃ devānaṃ abhidhammadesanaṃ desentena yāva yamakappakaraṇā
anya-e0906n:215_4: purimāni cha abhidhammappakaraṇāni desetvā tadanantaraṃ kiṃnāma pakaraṇaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:216_1: tena bhante bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena abhisambuddhakālato sattame vasse manussaloke
anya-e0906n:216_2: sāvatthiyaṃ kaṇḍambamūle yamakapāṭihīraṃ dassetvā tadanantaraṃ tāvatiṃsadevalokaṃ gantvā tattha paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ
anya-e0906n:216_3: sannipatitvā dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi āgamma sannisinnānaṃ devānaṃ abhidhammadesanaṃ desentena purimāni
anya-e0906n:216_4: cha abhidhammappakaraṇāni desetvā tadanantaraṃ anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma sattamaṃ mahāpakaraṇaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:217_0: Pucchā – taṃ panetaṃ āvuso paṭṭhānaṃ kenaṭṭhena paṭṭhānanti vuccati.
anya-e0906n:218_1: taṃ panetaṃ bhante paṭṭhānaṃ nānappakārapaccayaṭṭhena vibhajanaṭṭhena paṭṭhitaṭṭhena ca paṭṭhānanti vuccati.
anya-e0906n:219_0: Pucchā – tañcāvuso bhagavatā paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇaṃ desentena katihi vārehi vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:220_1: taṃ kho bhante bhagavatā paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇaṃ desentena mātikānikkhepavārasaṅkhāto paccayuddeso paccayaniddeso
anya-e0906n:221_0: Pucchā – tesu āvuso vāresu paṭhame mātikānikkhepavāre paccayuddesavāro bhagavatā kathaṃ desito.
anya-e0906n:222_1: tesu bhante dvīsu paricchedavāresu paṭhame mātikānikkhepavāre paccayuddese hetupaccayo ārammaṇapaccayo
anya-e0906n:222_2: adhipatipaccayo anantarapaccayo samanantarapaccayo sahajātapaccayo aññamaññapaccayo nissayapaccayo…pe…
anya-e0906n:222_4: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:223_0: Pucchā – tadanantaraṃ pana āvuso paccayaniddesavāro bhagavatā kathaṃ vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:224_2: hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:224_4: rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:224_8: Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:224_9: Rūpāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:224_10: Sabbe dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:224_11: Yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbha ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā,
anya-e0906n:224_12: te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:225_2: sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake sattame mahāpakaraṇe dvīsu padhānavāresu dutiye mahāvāre kati ṭhānāni vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:226_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne mahāpakaraṇe dvīsu padhānaparicchedavāresu
anya-e0906n:226_3: tathā dhammapaccanīye dhammānulomapaccanīye dhammapaccanīyānulometi catuvīsati paṭṭhānāni bhagavatā vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:228_1: tesupi āvuso catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatitikā bhagavatā katihi vārehi vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:229_1: tesu bhante catuvīsatiyā mahāpaṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatitikā paṭiccavāro sahajātavāro
anya-e0906n:229_2: paccayavāro nissayavāro saṃsaṭṭhavāro sampayuttavāro pañhāvāroti sattahi sattahi vārehi vibhajitvā bhagavatā desitā.
anya-e0906n:231_1: tesu cāvuso dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu paṭhamo paṭiccamahāvāro bhagavatā kathaṃ vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:232_1: tesu bhante dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu paṭhamo paṭiccamahāvāro siyā kusalaṃ
anya-e0906n:232_2: dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:232_3: Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:232_4: Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:232_5: Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalā ca abyākatā ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṃ hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:232_6: Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṃ hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:232_7: Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo ca akusalo ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṃ hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:232_8: Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo ca akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṃ hetupaccayā”ti evamādinā pucchāvārena ca.
anya-e0906n:232_9: “Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:232_10: Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
anya-e0906n:232_13: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:232_15: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:232_16: Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ,
anya-e0906n:232_17: tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ,
anya-e0906n:232_18: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpa”nti evamādinā vissajjanā vissajjanāvārena ca.
anya-e0906n:232_35: avigate navā”ti evamādinā saṅkhyāvārena ca bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:233_0: Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:235_2: sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:235_3: dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu dutiyo sahajātavāro kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:236_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante anantanayapaṭṭhāne mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:236_2: dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu dutiyo sahajātāvāro “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sahajāto
anya-e0906n:236_4: kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ sahajātā tayo khandhā,
anya-e0906n:236_7: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sahajāto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:236_9: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sahajāto kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:236_10: kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ sahajātā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ,
anya-e0906n:236_11: tayo khandhe sahajāto eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ,
anya-e0906n:236_12: dve khandhe cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpa”nti evamādinā vissajjanāvārena ca.
anya-e0906n:236_16: anantare samanantare tīṇī”ti evamādinā saṅkhyāvārena ca vācanāmaggato dvīhi vārehi paṭimaṇḍitvā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:238_2: sammāsambuddhena paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:238_3: tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu tatiyo paccayavāro kathaṃ vibhajitvā vitthārena desito.
anya-e0906n:239_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:239_2: paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne bāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu
anya-e0906n:239_3: tatiyo paccayavāro “siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:239_4: siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:239_5: siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti evamādinā pucchāvārena ca.
anya-e0906n:239_6: “Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:239_7: kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā,
anya-e0906n:239_9: dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā”ti evamādinā vissajjanāvārena ca.
anya-e0906n:239_16: Paccayānuloma paccaya paccaniya paccayānuloma paccanīya paccaya paccanīyānulomasaṅkhātehi catūhi nayehi vibhajitvā bhagavatā desito.
anya-e0906n:240_0: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:240_1: Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā,
anya-e0906n:242_2: sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake sattasu mahāpakaraṇesu sattame paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu
anya-e0906n:242_3: paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattamo pañhāvāro
anya-e0906n:243_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:243_2: paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu
anya-e0906n:243_3: sattamo pañhāvāro “siyā kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:243_4: Siyā kusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:243_5: Siyā kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā pucchāvārena ca.
anya-e0906n:243_7: kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:243_8: Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:243_9: kusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā vissajjanāvārena ca “hetuyā satta,
anya-e0906n:243_26: catūhi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:244_0: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:244_1: kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:244_2: Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:244_3: kusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:244_4: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:244_5: kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo ….
anya-e0906n:247_2: sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu
anya-e0906n:247_3: paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattame pañhāvāre
anya-e0906n:247_4: pucchāvissajjanāsaṅkhyāvārasaṅkhātesu tīsu vāresu vissajjanāvāre hetupaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena
anya-e0906n:248_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:248_2: paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu
anya-e0906n:248_3: sattame pañhāvāre paccayānulomapaccayapaccanīya paccayānuloma paccanīyapaccaya paccayanīyānulomasaṅkhātesu
anya-e0906n:248_4: catūsu nayesu paṭhame paccayānulomanaye pucchāvāravissajjanāvārasaṅkhyāvārasaṅkhātesu tīsupi vāresu dutiye
anya-e0906n:248_5: vissajjanāvāre hetupaccayavibhaṅgo “kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:248_6: kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:248_7: Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:248_8: Kusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:248_9: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:248_10: kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:249_2: kusalā hetū sampayattakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:249_3: Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:249_4: kusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:249_5: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:249_6: kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo”.
anya-e0906n:251_2: sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu
anya-e0906n:251_3: paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattame pañhāvāre
anya-e0906n:251_4: catūsu nayesu paṭhame paccayānulomanaye pucchāvissajjanāsaṅkhyāvārasaṅkhātesu tīsu vāresu dutiye vissajjanāvāre
anya-e0906n:251_5: hetupaccayavibhaṅgādīsu catuvīsatiyā vibhaṅgesu dutiyo ārammaṇapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:252_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:252_2: paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu
anya-e0906n:252_3: sattame pañhāvāre catūsu nayesu paṭhame paccayānulomanaye tīsu ca vāresu dutiye vibhaṅgavāre hetupaccayavibhaṅgādīsu
anya-e0906n:252_4: catuvīsatiyā vibhaṅgesu dutiyo ārammaṇapaccayavibhaṅgo “kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:252_5: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati,
anya-e0906n:252_11: sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā kusalaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti,
anya-e0906n:252_19: anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:254_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame
anya-e0906n:254_2: dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhānesu bāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattame pañhāvāre
anya-e0906n:254_3: catūsu nayesu paṭhame paccayānulomanaye pucchāvissajjanāsaṅkhyāsaṅkhātesu tīsu vāresu dutiye vissajjanāsaṅkhāte
anya-e0906n:254_4: vibhaṅgavāre hetupaccayavibhaṅgādīsu catuvīsatiyā vibhaṅgesu tatiyo adhipatipaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena
anya-e0906n:255_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:255_2: paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne bāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu
anya-e0906n:255_3: sattame pañhāvāre catūsu nayesu paṭhame paccayānulomanaye pucchāvissajjanāsaṅkhyāsaṅkhātesu tīsu vāresu
anya-e0906n:255_4: dutiye vissajjanāsaṅkhāte vibhaṅgavāre hetupaccayavibhaṅgādīsu catuvīsatiyā vibhaṅgesu tatiyo adhipatipaccayavibhaṅgo
anya-e0906n:255_8: Ārammaṇādhipati–dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati.
anya-e0906n:255_10: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati,
anya-e0906n:255_13: sekkhā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti.
anya-e0906n:255_14: Sahajātādhipati–kusalādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:257_2: catuttho anantarapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:258_2: catuttho anantarapaccayavibhaṅgo “kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:258_3: purimā purimā kusalā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:258_7: vodānaṃ maggassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:260_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… chaṭṭho sahajātapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:261_2: chaṭṭho sahajātapaccayavibhaṅgo “kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:261_3: kusalo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:261_4: tayo khandhā ekassa khandhassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:261_6: Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:261_7: kusalā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:263_2: navamo upanissayapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:264_2: navamo upanissayapaccayavibhaṅgo “kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:264_6: Ārammaṇūpanissayo–dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā kaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati…pe…
anya-e0906n:265_1: saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti sīlaṃ samādiyati uposathakammaṃ karoti,
anya-e0906n:265_6: samāpattiṃ uppādetī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:267_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… dasamo purejātapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:268_2: dasamo purejātapaccayavibhaṅgo “abyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:268_5: Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ–arahā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati. Ghānaṃ, jivhaṃ, kāyaṃ, rūpe, sadde, gandhe, rase,
anya-e0906n:268_20: vatthu vipākābyākatānaṃ kriyābyākatānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:270_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… terasamo kammapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:271_2: terasamo kammapaccayavibhaṅgo “kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:271_3: kusalā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:271_4: Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. Sahajātā,
anya-e0906n:271_6: Sahajātā–kusalā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:271_7: Nānākkhaṇikā–kusalā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:271_8: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:271_9: Kusalā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:273_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… pannarasamo āhārapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:274_2: pannarasamo āhārapaccayavibhaṅgo “kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:274_3: Kusalā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:274_4: Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:274_5: Kusalā āhārā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:276_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… soḷasamo indriyapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:277_2: soḷasamo indriyapaccayavibhaṅgo “kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:277_3: kusalo indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:277_4: Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:277_5: kusalā indriyā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:279_2: pucchāvissajjanāsaṅkhyāvārasaṅkhātesu tīsu vāresu tatiyo saṅkhyāvāro kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:280_18: avigate terasā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:281_0: Hetu sahajāta nissaya atthi avigatanti satta,
anya-e0906n:281_1: hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya atthi avigatanti tīṇi,
anya-e0906n:281_2: hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya sampayutta atthi avigatanti tīṇi …
anya-e0906n:283_2: paṭhamaṃ kusalattikaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā tadanantaraṃ avasesā vedanāttikādayo ekavīsatitikā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:284_2: paṭhamaṃ kusalattikaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā tadanantaraṃ avasesā vedanāttikādayo ekavīsatitikā “sukhāya
anya-e0906n:284_3: vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:284_4: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā,
anya-e0906n:284_6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā,
anya-e0906n:284_7: dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho”ti evamādinā ca.
anya-e0906n:284_8: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:284_9: Vipākaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
anya-e0906n:284_12: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
anya-e0906n:284_15: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:284_18: khandhe paṭicca vatthū”ti evamādinā ca ekekasmiṃ tike sattahi sattahi mahāvārehi ekekasmiñca mahāvāre
anya-e0906n:284_19: catūhi catūhi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:286_2: tikapaṭṭhānādīsu chasu antogadhapaṭṭhānādīsu paṭhamaṃ tikapaṭṭhānaṃ desetvā tadanantaraṃ dukapaṭṭhānaṃ kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:287_2: tikapaṭṭhānādīsu chasu antogadhapaṭṭhānādīsu paṭhamaṃ tikapaṭṭhānaṃ vibhajitvā tadanantaraṃ dukapaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0906n:287_3: “hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:287_11: Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo dammo uppajjati hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:287_12: saraṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
anya-e0906n:287_15: Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:287_17: Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo ca araṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:287_18: Saraṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ,
anya-e0906n:287_19: tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ,
anya-e0906n:287_20: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpa”nti evamādinā ca.
anya-e0906n:287_21: Ekekasmiṃ duke sattahi sattahi mahāvārehi ekekasmiñca mahāvāre catūhi catūhi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:288_0: Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:288_1: saraṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
anya-e0906n:288_2: tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho, dve
anya-e0906n:291_2: tikapaṭṭhānādīsu chasu antogadhapaṭṭhānesu paṭhamaṃ tikapaṭṭhānañca dutiyaṃ dukapaṭṭhānañca vibhajitvā
anya-e0906n:291_3: tadavasesāni dukatikapaṭṭhānādīni cattāro paṭṭhānāni kathaṃ vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:292_2: tikapaṭṭhānādīsu chasu antogadhapaṭṭhānesu paṭhamaṃ tikapaṭṭhānañca dutiyaṃ dukapaṭṭhānañca vibhajitvā
anya-e0906n:292_3: tadavasesā dukatikapaṭṭhānādayo “hetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:292_4: Hetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:292_5: Hetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:292_6: nahetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:292_7: nahetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:292_8: nahetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā”ti evamādinā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:294_2: paṭhamaṃ dhammānulomapaṭṭhānaṃ vibhajitvā tadanantaraṃ dutiyaṃ dhammapaccanīyapaṭṭhānaṃ kathaṃ vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:295_2: paṭhamaṃ dhammānulomapaṭṭhānaṃ vibhajitvā tadanantaraṃ dutiyaṃ dhammapaccanīyapaṭṭhānaṃ “nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ
anya-e0906n:295_4: Akusalābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca akusalābyākatā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
anya-e0906n:295_5: Tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
anya-e0906n:295_6: Dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
anya-e0906n:295_7: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā.
anya-e0906n:295_8: Vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
anya-e0906n:295_9: Tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
anya-e0906n:295_10: Dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
anya-e0906n:295_12: nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:295_13: Akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
anya-e0906n:295_15: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā”ti evamādinā tikapaṭṭhānādīhi chahi antogadhapaṭṭhānehi ekekasmiñca tikapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:295_16: dukapaṭṭhāne dukatikapaṭṭhāne tikadukapaṭṭhāne tikatikapaṭṭhāne dukadukapaṭṭhāne sattahi sattahi mahāvārehi
anya-e0906n:295_17: ekekasmiñca mahāvāre catūhi catūhi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:297_2: tatiyaṃ dhammānulomapaccanīyapaṭṭhānaṃ kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:298_2: tatiyaṃ dhammānulomapaccanīyapaṭṭhānaṃ “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:298_4: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:298_5: Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
anya-e0906n:298_6: Tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
anya-e0906n:298_7: Dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
anya-e0906n:298_8: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:298_9: Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
anya-e0906n:298_12: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:298_13: Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…
anya-e0906n:298_15: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:298_16: Kusale khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānarūpa”nti evamādinā bhante tikapaṭṭhānādīhi chahi antogadhapaṭṭhānehi
anya-e0906n:298_17: ekekasmiñca tikapaṭṭhāne dukapaṭṭhāne tikadukapaṭṭhāne dukatikapaṭṭhāne tikatikapaṭṭhāne dukadukapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:298_18: sattahi sattahi mahāvārehi ekekasmiñca mahāvāre catūhi catūhi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:300_2: dhammānulomādīsu padhānabhūtesu catūsu paṭṭhānesu catutthaṃ pariyosānabhūtaṃ dhammapaccanīyānulomapaṭṭhānaṃ kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:301_2: dhammānulomapaṭṭhānādīsu catūsu padhānabhūtesu mahāpaṭṭhānesu catutthaṃ pariyosānabhūtaṃ dhammapaccanīyānulomapaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0906n:301_3: “nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:301_4: akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
anya-e0906n:301_7: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:301_9: vipākābyākataṃ kriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…
anya-e0906n:301_10: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
anya-e0906n:301_13: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:301_14: akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
anya-e0906n:301_16: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā”ti evamādinā tikapaṭṭhānādīhi cāti antogadhapabhedapaṭṭhānehi ekekasmiñca
anya-e0906n:301_17: tikapaṭṭhāne dukapaṭṭhāne dukatikatikadukatikatikadukadukapaṭṭhāne paṭiccavārādīhi sattahi mahāvārehi
anya-e0906n:301_18: ekekasmiñca mahāvāre paccayānulomādīhi catūhi catūhi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
